name: Rocket Gnome
description:
Rocket Gnome is testing their rocket. Try to reach stable orbits with as little fuel used as possible.

CONTROLS:

  • Zoom and pan camera - on computer - with mousewheel and dragging mouse or - on touchscreen - two fingers dragging and spreading.
  • Blue slider: Speeds up or slows down time. This does not affect anything else.
  • Yellow slider: Rotates the ship. To get zero rotation, aim in the middle and then pull the slider upwards a bit.
  • Red slider: Thrust to accelerate our ship. To stop presimulations when turned on, pull the slider to the far left.
  • Click the ship to switch on/off presimulations. But don't do it the very first second of the game, to prevent error.

The presimulations may seem buggy when you enter and exit orbits, but this is mostly because they are relative to the planet with the greates gravity at each given point. Fast forward through the presimulated curves and you will see.
